full_summary:
# Year-End Financial Statements Audit - National Public Procurement 

## Tender No.: CIPO208520 

### Tender Type: Competitive Selective Tendering 

### Tender Status: Expired 

## Overview

This announcement seeks external auditors to examine the financial statements of the Office of the Auditor General of Canada. The selected contractor will provide audit services under the framework of the Professional Audit Support Services Supply Arrangement (PASS), with the aim of identifying and reporting on the financial outcomes of each fiscal year.

## Key Highlights 

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering 
* **Term:** Based on contract duration specified in the PASS Agreement 
* **Delivery Location:** Canada, specifically National Capital Region (NCR) 
* **Trade Agreements:** Covered by various sections of the Free Trade Agreements and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement 

## Evaluation Criteria 

Bidders will be evaluated based on a combined score for their technical merit and price.

## Solicitation Documents 

The tender documents are available for download:

* [Year-End Financial Statements Audit - National Public Procurement (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25147/cipo208520-npp_en.pdf)
* [Year-End Financial Statements Audit - National Public Procurement (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25147/cipo208520-npp_fr.pdf)
* [Amendment 1 to the RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25147/pass-rfp-cipo208520---addendem-1.pdf)
